mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tylor's Theory, notes; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 113-275, Scrapbook of Faulds Fingerprint Notes (includes publication and manuscript items.)Page 54; "Mr. Alfred Tylor's Theory"; Handwritten notes regarding color patterns of animals being a side-effect of internal body elements. Mention of Professor Paulson, and reference to The Colours of Animals, page 323, 1890.; 1 leaf; DF 871
